item.title: 【Off-Topic】A way to watch TV Shows, Movies, and Anime on your Android device
item.description:
I found Cloudstream, an open-source app that uses repositories to give you ways to watch anything.
Features:
  • AdFree, No ads whatsoever
  • No tracking/analytics
  • Bookmarks
  • Download and stream movies, tv-shows, and anime
  • Chromecast Support
One downside is that you will need to find them online. Thankfully you can find some repositories here: https://rentry.org/cs3-repos

You can download the app here: https://github.com/recloudstream/cloudstream
item.author: charlescanlom
